events.message: I recently bought a pair of headphones and I would like to request a refund because they stopped working after just two days of use.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for a money back on faulty headphones.
The refund department agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the defective product.
Hello, thank you for reaching out to us about your issue. We’re sorry to hear your headphones stopped working and will assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the headphones showing the defect so we can verify and process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 452178 and attached are photos showing the broken connector and the damage inside the headphone jack.
Thank you for the details. We have approved your refund request. Please return the faulty headphones using the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the headphones back today.
We have received the returned headphones and processed your refund successfully. The amount will reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was completed and no further issues reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your cooperation.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. We’d appreciate if you could take a moment to share your feedback.
